pages.text: $(item)Nectar$() is known to be the delight (and fuel) of gods, the first gift of the Feasting King. It tastes like the... sweetest? honey. While it thankfully does not exactly taste like ten ounces of sugar, its taste is quite... thrilling. The most thrilling part is definitely the immense pain the consumer feels.
While it can be consumed to grant immense buffs, one should refrain from doing so, as it also causes $(o)a lot$() of damage.
